name: invoiceplane
description: InvoicePlane is a classic self hosted invoicing and billing application. It lets businesses create quotes, invoices, recurring bills and track payments with a straightforward web interface and customizable templates.
features: Invoice Creation: Generate professional invoices with customizable templates.
Quote Management: Create and send quotes that can be converted to invoices.
Payment Tracking: Record payments and track outstanding balances.
Client Management: Maintain client database with contact information and history.
Recurring Invoices: Set up automatic recurring billing for subscription services.
Tax Support: Calculate taxes with configurable tax rates and rules.
PDF Generation: Export invoices and quotes as PDF documents.
Multi-Currency: Support international clients with multiple currency options.
